content: I'll definitely try to niche down my targeting and use Facebook's advanced features. I've been meaning to create a lookalike audience based on my website visitors, but I'm not sure how to do it. Can you walk me through the process or point me in the direction of a good resource? Also, I've been working on my business plan for three months now, and I'm trying to project my revenue for the next quarter. Do you have any resources or tips on how to create a realistic revenue forecast?
